arts.ttl: Champions League Liveblog: Manchester City vs. Napoli
Manchester City vs Napoli - Champions League Pre-Match Analysis - VAVEL International
arts.sum: Manchester City begin their UEFA Champions League campaign with a mouth-watering clash against Italian champions Napoli at the Etihad Stadium. Napoli have never won away to an English side in European competition (P12 W0 D3 L9), drawing only with Leicester City (2-2, Europa League 2021/22).
